mapper.select: select w.num, w.type, w.content, w.status, w.writeday, w.finishday, w.qnaNum, reviewNum, roomNum, r.name, hostNum, userNum, m.nickname, h.companyName from warning w left join member m on m.idx = w.userNum left join room r on r.num = w.roomNum left join host h on r.hostNum = h.num ${sort}
mapper.insert: insert into warning (num, type, content, status, writeday, finishday, QnANum,reviewNum, roomNum, userNum) values (null, #{reportType}, #{reportContent}, #{status}, now(), null, #{QnANum}, #{reviewNum}, #{roomNum}, #{userNum})
